customer_reviews.title: If you have painful,  cracked hands, this cream is your answer.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Ahava hand creams before and liked them. My daughter gave me Dead Sea Mud Cream because I suffer with painful cracked hands in winter. I liked the product very much. In fact, my Amazon purchase was to get another tube, as my first was running out. I use it - without fail - every night. I have had no cracked hands since the end of December. It is a heavier cream than Ahava’s regular hand cream, but it absorbs quickly and is not at all greasy. I love the product and will make sure I have it every winter. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.

product_meta.description:
"

MAGNIFICENT MUDS
Dead Sea mud, the most mineral-rich mud on earth, provides rich nourishment to soothe dry or irritated skin. Dermud™ Intensive Hand Cream uses AHAVA’s patented ‘leave on’ mud technology to deliver the benefits of Dead Sea mud, softening & soothing dry, rough, and sensitive hands, without any mess or inconvenience. This rich hand cream, helps to lock in moisture like an invisible glove, keeping hands soft and supple even in extreme dry conditions. Experience immediate relief to scaling, cracked, or very dry hands.

BENEFITS:
Dramatic relief for dry, rough, and sensitive hands
Delivers lasting protection, creating an “invisible glove”
Perfect choice for hands that struggle during winter or are constantly in water
Provides lasting hydration even after multiple hand washings

KEY INGREDIENTS:

 * Dead Sea mud, vitamins, and plants provide intense hydration, softening, and soothing the skin
 * Dead Sea mud enhances antioxidant protection
 * Jojoba Seed Oil locks and seals in moisture

DIRECTIONS FOR USE
Apply a small amount to clean hands as needed, especially after washing hands.

 * Paraben, phthalate & SLS-free
 * Dermatologist tested and allergy tested
 * Approved for Sensitive Skin
 * PETA certified & cruelty free & vegan
 * Petroleum Free
 * Allergy free
